name: The 17th Int'l Conference on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing (WiCOM 2023)
content: The 17th Int'l Conference on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing (WiCOM 2023) will be held during Oct. 30 - Nov. 1, 2023 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing. The aim of WiCOM 2023 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
